title: PilotsEYE.tv.2009.Overcoming.the.Fear.of.Flying.720p.BDRip.x264
description:
Overcoming the Fear of Flying

Sociopolitical Documentary with no narration published by AignerMEDIA broadcasted as part of PilotsEYE.tv series in 2009 - German language
 
http://docuwiki.net/images/6/6d/Overcoming-the-Fear-of-Flying-Cover.jpg

Information
------------------------------

One out of three passengers does not feel secure during a flight. The team at PilotsEye.tv had the opportunity to accompany 12 participants of a Lufthansa Aviophobia workshop during the entire training. These workshops have been successful for the past 30 years. The trainer, psychologist Antonia Arboleda-Hahnemann, works together with the participants for the cause of the uncomfortable feeling between takeoff and landing. "Flying Relaxed - Overcoming the Fear of Flying" views the flight to Hamburg from three perspectives: from the cabin, from the technology, and from air traffic control. Offstage - What Really Happens between Check-In and Disembarking The audience receives detailed information from the staff in the tower about the procedure between tower and pilot before clearance for takeoff. They are taken behind the technical scenes of flying: the strange and abrupt noises before and during the flight: PilotsEYE.tv shows the actual source of those noises. "A familiar, yet ...
